Cloud Share is an Application That Lets You Connect to Those Around You Instantly

The Internet Connects us to People Far and Wide We Don\'t Even Know. But What if the People Nearest You Defined the Internet? What if You Were Connected Instantly and Personally to Those Around You? We Bet That the Powers of the Internet Would Become Far Greater, and Far More Social.

This project was created for Yale CS434: Mobile Computing and Wireless Networks, taught by Professor Yang Yang. A lesson in ad hoc network implementation, the android phone makes a connection to phones with this application installed on it nearby. The created networks then have a distributed system layered on top in order to facilitate network interaction via chat and file sharing.

For documentation about this assignment, or others like it, please visit the Yale CS434 course home page.
